name: Lincoln Reserve Group Inc.
tag_list: guarantees, lending, investing, swift, mt999, sblc, private-money-market-accounts
overview:
Lincoln Reserve Group, (LRG) is a private venture capital firm organized to help operating entities, investing and capital management organizations and entrepreneurial individuals reach their financial objectives.

As a direct lender and financial planner, LRG offers its clients a full range of services including: •Corporate finance and financial advisory services customized to meet client requirements. •Hedge fund investment opportunities for high net worth individuals, financial institutions and government agencies. •Project financing •Acquisition advisory services

LRG was founded on the following business philosophies: •Market tested skills and experience in transactions of all sizes •Senior level attention in all situations •Confidentiality in all circumstances •Custom distribution systems for clients with other financial investment organizations •Competitive, cost effective fee structures
